description:
Scam website claiming to be a Coinbase defi swap site. According to etherscan, some of the stolen funds were cashed out at binance. 


https://etherscan.io/address/0x340d95069002a2e9a9d1cd07b184a8c738ffcf8f#tokentxns

1.0x47b203f7356fcca22b86ba055af15b805285f7ece5a735be5b186fa5f3cea215

2.0x6dbbda7a9be09c2a6e641e4b4a3e0bc9b0f4cb00d2d9d04ae69d1559fd1edfef

description: Yuga Labs announced it was targeted in a hack that compromised its Instagram account resulting in a fake mint website being released. The attacker stole over 100 NFTs and may be associated with previous phish sites reported by chainabuse via airdrop category.
descriptionMarkdown: Yuga Labs announced it was targeted in a hack that compromised its Instagram account resulting in a fake mint website being released. The attacker stole over 100 NFTs and may be associated with previous phish sites reported by chainabuse via airdrop category.

description: Zachxbt identified three addresses associated with fake yuga labs twitter account claiming affiliation with theotherside meta drop. Bored Ape Yach Club (BAYC) keeps getting targeted by scammers.
descriptionMarkdown: Zachxbt identified three addresses associated with fake yuga labs twitter account claiming affiliation with theotherside meta drop. Bored Ape Yach Club (BAYC) keeps getting targeted by scammers.

description: This is a fake website claiming association with a Binance bitcoin, binance smart chain and binance ethereum giveaway. Avoid this is a scam.
descriptionMarkdown: This is a fake website claiming association with a Binance bitcoin, binance smart chain and binance ethereum giveaway. Avoid this is a scam.

description: Scammers targeting Binance customers with a fake giveaway scam. Do not send any crypto.
descriptionMarkdown: Scammers targeting Binance customers with a fake giveaway scam. Do not send any crypto.

description: Luna giveaway is fake. The fake website requires the user to select between a Binance, Coinbase, or crypto wallet and provides a bitcoin, ethereum, or bsc address.
descriptionMarkdown: Luna giveaway is fake. The fake website requires the user to select between a Binance, Coinbase, or crypto wallet and provides a bitcoin, ethereum, or bsc address.

description: Elon Musk scam that claims users will receive more crypto if they send either bitcoin or ethereum. You will get rugged.
descriptionMarkdown: Elon Musk scam that claims users will receive more crypto if they send either bitcoin or ethereum. You will get rugged.

description: Ark Investments and Elon Musk scam. Do not send bitcoin or ethereum here or you will get rugged.
descriptionMarkdown: Ark Investments and Elon Musk scam. Do not send bitcoin or ethereum here or you will get rugged.

description: Elon Musk scam targeting Shiba INU hodlers. Dont send crypto here. CLaims you will get crypto back if you send crypto.
descriptionMarkdown: Elon Musk scam targeting Shiba INU hodlers. Dont send crypto here. CLaims you will get crypto back if you send crypto.

description: Beeple's twitter account was compromised via an account take over (ATO) attack. The ATO resulted in a malicious phishing linked being posted direct to his twitter profile for a fake NFT mint. Requires connection to meta mask wallet. Great summary of the attack here: https://twitter.com/sniko_/status/1528320829741842432
descriptionMarkdown: Beeple's twitter account was compromised via an account take over (ATO) attack. The ATO resulted in a malicious phishing linked being posted direct to his twitter profile for a fake NFT mint. Requires connection to meta mask wallet. Great summary of the attack here: https://twitter.com/sniko_/status/1528320829741842432

description: Scammers created a clone of an OpenSea website dedicated to Bored Ape Yacht Club (BAYC) NFTs.  The ethereum address was recently funded with eight ethereum. Scammers are attempting to create hype that someone is buying the fake NFTs or someone was scammed attempting to purchase almost two BAYC.
descriptionMarkdown: Scammers created a clone of an OpenSea website dedicated to Bored Ape Yacht Club (BAYC) NFTs.  The ethereum address was recently funded with eight ethereum. Scammers are attempting to create hype that someone is buying the fake NFTs or someone was scammed attempting to purchase almost two BAYC.

description: Linked to a twitter phishing scam resulting in three stolen NFTs from my wallet (0x050531406e9417240f20f1b558E5757D14E56920 / rdraper.ens). The ENS also got taken.
descriptionMarkdown: Linked to a twitter phishing scam resulting in three stolen NFTs from my wallet (0x050531406e9417240f20f1b558E5757D14E56920 / rdraper.ens). The ENS also got taken.

description: BAYC and OtherSide Discord was hacked resulting in attackers posting a fake NFT minting link.  Attackers deposited 40+ ethereum to Tornado Cash as of the date of this post. Multiple NFTs stolen.
descriptionMarkdown: BAYC and OtherSide Discord was hacked resulting in attackers posting a fake NFT minting link.  Attackers deposited 40+ ethereum to Tornado Cash as of the date of this post. Multiple NFTs stolen.

description: BAYC & Otherside Discord Compromised with 179 ETH sent into Tornado. Linked to other recent compromised Discords such as Trait Sniper, LazerTools, NBATopShot, KaijuKingz, and more. One of the main people responsible is known as "Popbob"
descriptionMarkdown: BAYC & Otherside Discord Compromised with 179 ETH sent into Tornado. Linked to other recent compromised Discords such as Trait Sniper, LazerTools, NBATopShot, KaijuKingz, and more. One of the main people responsible is known as "Popbob"

description: Kaizzen a free to mint NFT scam in which minting the NFT actually drained your wallet.  The art for the project was stolen from another artist. The Twitter account has now been deactivated. The scammer has liquidated the NFTs for $40k+ so far.
descriptionMarkdown: Kaizzen a free to mint NFT scam in which minting the NFT actually drained your wallet.  The art for the project was stolen from another artist. The Twitter account has now been deactivated. The scammer has liquidated the NFTs for $40k+ so far.

description:
Phishing/drainer - 
This site contains a script which when connecting with metamask, checks your wallet balances. If your wallet is holding more than 0.001 ETH it will initiate a transaction to send funds to this address 0xe6221E24f2B449F8ba3EfC196cef1d6786d1C19c
descriptionMarkdown:
Phishing/drainer - 
This site contains a script which when connecting with metamask, checks your wallet balances. If your wallet is holding more than 0.001 ETH it will initiate a transaction to send funds to this address 0xe6221E24f2B449F8ba3EfC196cef1d6786d1C19c
